fields.description:
When building a module if the apiversion in the manifest does not match the platforms apiversion in the SDK then the module build will fail.

Ideally, the {{apiversion}} and {{minSDK}} should be the product of a build, and dictated by the module build for the selected SDK version.
fields.summary: Module build should automatically update manifest `apiversion` and `minSDK`
